item.title: Argon OSRS
item.dc:creator: @FuzenSeth FuzenSeth
item.description:
@FuzenSeth wrote:

Updates:
Sound system
Plays correct region sounds at correct areas.
The song will be directly updated.
Many areas are added by default.
Combatscript System
Developers have ability to add fast full combat scripts for bosses, e.g godwars.
I have created a tool to create combat emotes (if the NPC doesn’t have special script e.g multi-attack)
NPCDrop editor
Ability to create decent, accurate npc drops.
Server Management panel
Ability to give punishment.
Players online
Update
Restart
Logs
Bug patches
NPC Following.
Tzhaar fight caves waves.
Banking
Horror from the deep has been fixed.
Server network usage patches (we got 50% better performance).
Pathfinder updates.
Following updates (you can see the change when you follow a player).

Since we support the boss pet item models now I will be working with the boss pet system.

Crafting
Gem cutting was pretty buggy, so I re-wrote the whole skill


Toggle-able features added to client

example

Slayer partners (duo-slayer)

Read full topic

item.title: Argon OSRS
item.dc:creator: @FuzenSeth FuzenSeth
item.description:
@FuzenSeth wrote:

[quote=“Loveandpower, post:8, topic:547967”]ironically I had suggested a similar pet system

Loving the updates[/quote]

Nice to see you still here I remember you following Enso’s project thread! And thanks.

We are advancing the server currently effectively the Bounty hunter has been finished and contains pretty much no bugs (I spent a nice 2 hours trying to bug abuse my best and find bugs).

Added basic barrows minigame.

In this picture i’ve defeated all the 5 barrows brothers expect Dharok.

Here i’m at the barrows chest (my final barrows brother to kill).

After defeating the final barrows brother I can open the chest and receive a reward.

Sound packet done client sided was an bitch to do but worth it.

Basic sounds added
-food
-pots
-melee weapon
-ancients (cast+ hit)
-special attack

Video of sounds
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=x_ke_1m2GCU

Added camerashake packet

Read full topic

item.title: Argon OSRS
item.dc:creator: @FuzenSeth FuzenSeth
item.description:
@FuzenSeth wrote:

I have finally finished the boss pet system. Some pets can be purchased at nightmare zone rewards shop such as the barrows brother pets, but that’s not all there’s still some pets that can be achieved by killing the actual boss.

Example
If you would kill King black dragon and you manage to get the pet the pet would directly appear following you after the boss drop, you will be informed in the chatbox as well once you get it.

I have finished Argon’s perk system.

What are perks?
Can be bought from donator’s store by using donator points.
Click a perk scroll, it will tell you in dialogue what it will do and are you sure that you want to use it

Once you use a perk scroll
The perk you have used will stay life-time on your Argon character.
You can no longer get the scroll back once it is used.
You will receive the benefit of the scroll.
Perk levels
Perk scrolls can be upgraded by using same perk scroll again, the maxinum perk level is 3.
The higher perk level you have the more bonus you can get out of it.

Mining perk - Ability to receive extra ores to bank account.

Lumberjack perk - Bonus experience to woodcutting skill.

There’s still some very useful perks such as for slayer, and even for run restoration. The shop will be finished soon.

Started with full barbarian fishing, finished the rod fishing fully but there’s still some stuff to do such as bare-hands fishing. Took kinda some time since I wrote this BarbarianFishing class from scratch and including the skill data enum plus a temporaryAttribrute hashmap :).

The fish catch is based on player’s fishing level.

Started with full barbarian fishing, finished the rod fishing fully but there’s still some stuff to do such as bare-hands fishing. Took kinda some time since I wrote this BarbarianFishing class from scratch and including the skill data enum plus a temporaryAttribrute hashmap :).

The fish catch is based on player’s fishing level.

Requirements

Item
Feathers
Barbarian rod

Level
Level 48+ fishing.
At level 58 you can catch leaping salmon and trouts.
At level 70 you can catch leaping sturgeon, salmon and trouts.

Added Bounty hunter we will implement emblem drops later we are also planning to add BH risk head icons based on player’s wealth carried in wilderness. We are open to listen your suggestions with bounty hunter.

Made a start on the perk scroll upgrading.

Finished sandwich lady event, gotta add dialogue only next.

Ignoring the ladie.

Read full topic
